subject: Basketball
Knees
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: DeJuan Blair dropped in the draft because he has no anterior cruciate ligament in his knees. Now he is leading all rookies with 7.3 rebounds a game.
snippet: DeJuan Blair dropped in the draft because he has no anterior cruciate ligament in his knees. Now he is leading all rookies with 7.3 rebounds a game.
